001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collections;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010/**
011 * Linked hash map which provides source location information for keys.
012 * @author Pavel Vlasov
013 *
014 * @param <K>
015 * @param <V>
016 */
017@SuppressWarnings("serial")
018public class MarkedLinkedHashMap<K, V> extends LinkedHashMap<K, V> implements Marked, Markable {
019        
020        private Map<K, List<? extends Marker>> entryMarkers = new HashMap<>();
021
022        public void markEntry(K key, Marker marker) {
023                markEntry(key, Collections.singletonList(marker));
024        }
025        
026        public void markEntry(K key, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
027                entryMarkers.put(key, markers);
028        }
029
030        public List<? extends Marker> getEntryMarkers(Object key) {
031                return entryMarkers.get(key);
032        }
033        
034        private List<? extends Marker> markers = new ArrayList<>();
035
036        @Override
037        public void mark(List<? extends Marker> markers) {
038                this.markers = markers;         
039        }
040
041        @Override
042        public List<? extends Marker> getMarkers() {
043                return markers;
044        }
045        
046        /**
047         * Also carries over markers
048         */
049        @Override
050        public void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V> m) {
051                super.putAll(m);
052                if (m instanceof MarkedLinkedHashMap) {
053                        MarkedLinkedHashMap<? extends K,?> mm = (MarkedLinkedHashMap<? extends K,?>) m;
054                        for (K key: mm.keySet()) {
055                                markEntry(key, mm.getEntryMarkers(key));
056                        }
057                }
058        }
059        
060}
